profiles.executiveSummary: Extensive experience in all aspects of the software development life cycle within the Pharmaceutical and Defense Contracting industries. Specific expertise in JavaScript, JSON, Java and XML, and middle-tier application design, development and deployment. A resourceful and well-rounded team player able to build productive working relationships with individuals at all levels in the organization. Proven record of success in developing innovative approaches and solutions to clients’ business problems and opportunities.

certifications.name: React: Building Large Apps
descriptions: Topics include: Working with the Electrode and Electrify libraries, React project organization, State management with redux-saga, Testing with Jest, Mocha, and Chai, Continuous integration with Travis CI, SSR and caching optimization

positionHistories.title: Recruiting Workgroup Member
descriptions: Attend meetings to define use cases and schema definitions for recruiting workgroups.

positionHistories.title: Senior IT Engineer
descriptions: Designed and developed n-tier applications using a validated software development methodology. Collaborated with team members on moderate to large, complex projects and supported multiple critical functions, platforms, complex technologies and processes.

Developed middle-tier in multi-site application to develop a Global Compound Inventory System/Sample Plate Management System, which enabled scientists to order and track compounds for high throughput screening (HTS). The application interfaced with the existing compound database and new robotic storage and processing systems. Served as build master for development, staging and production utilizing CVS, Bugzilla, and an in-house change management application.
Managed a 5 person development team for the Discovery Quick Reports application, that linked a 2 million chemical and biological test results system with Documentum and genomic and sequence data.

Developed and implemented a web based chemical registration form printing application. The structures were rendered via a web service developed on a Windows Server. This application allowed users to print multiple registration documents saving significant time and expense during the patent registration process.

Developed a server application, which automated the conversion of hundreds of TIFF images into PDF documents and imported them into Documentum, allowing more efficient processing of clinical study files and case report forms for drug submissions. Processing time was reduced from months to weeks.

positionHistories.title: Senior IT Engineer
descriptions: Provided year 2000 engineering support to clients using Raytheon’s “How to 2000” Methodology. Conducted systems analysis in the discovery, analysis, and remediation steps in Y2K projects.
Performed inventory and analysis of embedded systems at Corn Products International to ensure that systems would continue to function at the turn of the millennium.

positionHistories.title: Programmer/Analyst
descriptions: Designed and developed database systems and provided application programming and technical support under private and government contracts. Analyzed customer application needs and created system specification documents, manuals and development schedules. Developed program code, tested and installed software, instructed users, and provided customer support.

Designed and developed database applications for the Naval Air Warfare Center Warminster Transition Team for financial planning, personnel tracking, logistic planning of office and laboratory relocation efforts, and decision support systems.

Designed and maintained project’s web servers, which served vital documents and queries to senior management via the Internet. Assisted in the design and development of a major Microsoft Project database that encompassed all facets of the Transition Team Work Breakdown Structure.
Designed and developed CA-Clipper application enhancements for the Mission Avionics Technology Division.
Created system requirements document for an internal financial planning and accounting system at the AEGIS Technical Representative in Moorestown, NJ..
